title: Trump to visit Asheville, LA; Deportation flights begin: Live updates
shortDescription: Donald and Melania Trump will stop in North Carolina, California and Nevada during the first trip of his second term. Follow along for live updates.

title: What is the Lumbee Tribe? Trump seeks recognition for NC group
shortDescription: The Lumbee Tribe of North Carolina has for years sought federal recognition, and President Donald Trump is pushing for them to have it.

title: Trump embarks on presidential trip for look at unprecedented damage
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will visit areas devastated by floods in North Carolina and fires in California, as debates rage about recovery and funding.

title: Why Democratic attorneys general sued Trump over birthright citizenship
shortDescription: Democratic attorneys general told USA TODAY they fear Donald Trump's birthright citizenship order will erase funding for children's health care.

title: Gaza ceasefire is finally upon us. Is it all because of Trump?
shortDescription: Both the Trump and Biden administrations have publicly claimed credit for pushing the agreement over the line.

title: Trump knocks Ukraine leader, threatens Russian sanctions in interview
shortDescription: Donald Trump said in an interview with Fox News that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy "shouldn't have allowed" war in his country to happen.

title: Trump deputizes thousands more to arrest immigrants
shortDescription: The Trump administration authorized U.S. Marshals, DEA and Bureau of Prisons officers to conduct immigration enforcement.

title: Danish politician rebukes President Trump's bid to buy Greenland
shortDescription: Before the European Parliament, a Danish politician tells Trump in no uncertain terms that Greenland is not for sale. Find out what he said.

title: Trump executive order to release secret documents
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has ordered the release of secret documents surrounding the assassinations of several prominent political figures.

title: Trump's Education Department cuts DEI programs and staff
shortDescription: The Education Department says it has placed diversity, equity and inclusion staff on leave and canceled over $2.6 million in DEI-related contracts.

title: Would Mississippi bill ban unprotected sex? What to know.
shortDescription: Democratic state Sen. Bradford Blackmon says he's proposing the bill as a political jab at Republicans who support banning some forms of contraception.

title: After long fight, Trump order could lead NC tribe to recognition
shortDescription: The Lumbee Tribe of North Carolina has pushed for federal recognition for decades. A new executive order instructs Interior Department to help.

title: Trump says he'll appeal judge blocking birthright citizenship order
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge John Coughenour of Seattle, who blocked the order on Thursday, blasted it as “blatantly unconstitutional.”

title: Danish politician tells Trump to 'F*** off'
shortDescription: A Danish European Parliament member had strong language in response to President Donald Trump's idea of purchasing Greenland.

title: Read Trump's executive order declassifying assassinations here
shortDescription: On Thursday, President Donald Trump signed an executive order declassifying records of the assassinations of JFK, RFK and MLK. Read it here.

title: Episcopal bishop addressed Trump at prayer service | Fact check
shortDescription: Mariann Edgar Budde serves in the Episcopal Church, which affirms the LGBTQ community. The Catholic Church does not allow women to serve as bishops.

title: No record of Trump ordering cuts over 'LGBTQ activism' | Fact check
shortDescription: The phrase quoted in the claim does not appear in any of the orders Trump had issued when the post was shared.

title: Trump moves to release secret JFK, RFK and MLK documents
shortDescription: Trump's order is aimed at releasing documents related to the assassinations of the former president, presidential candidate and civil rights leader.

title: Trump threatens to withhold federal funds amid LA wildfires
shortDescription: During a Fox News interview, Trump falsely claimed California Gov. Gavin Newsom's fish conservation efforts were responsible for dry hydrants

title: Trump nominee Pete Hegseth moves closer to Pentagon confirmation
shortDescription: Pete Hegseth is closer to Senate confirmation as Trump's Defense secretary despite controversy and allegations of serious impropriety.

title: Trump administration pauses communication from federal health agencies
shortDescription: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services has paused public communications until Feb. 1 as Trump appointees take control of health agencies.

title: Trump CIA Director John Ratcliffe confirmed by Senate
shortDescription: The former Texas lawmaker and prosecutor was Trump's national intelligence director in his first term. He vowed to reject White House political pressure

title: RFK Jr. to make money on lawsuits while in Trump administration
shortDescription: The secretary of Health and Human Services nominee wrote in an ethics agreement that he would keep receiving contingency fees.

title: Judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship executive order
shortDescription: The order has already become the subject of five lawsuits by civil rights groups and Democratic attorneys general from 22 states.

title: Trump's anti-DEI initiatives aimed at 'reverse discrimination'
shortDescription: Many underrepresented people who built successful government careers credited those laws and their enforcement with expanding the path to prosperity.

title: Tech execs attend Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg and other top tech executives attended Trump's presidential inauguration.

title: Marco Rubio to visit Panama as Donald Trump lashes out at country
shortDescription: Marco Rubio will travel to Panama on his first trip abroad as secretary of State. The visit comes as Donald Trump looks to reclaim Panama's canal.
